title: Cap, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen, silk, metallic
Technique: embroidery
dimensions:
H x W: 30 cm (11 13/16 in.)
folded
description: Cap of cream white cotton, made in four conical sections. Seams stitched in silver thread, joined at top with metal tassel. Embroidered with small-scale flower sprays in blue, white, and metal thread. Cuff embroidered in symmetrical pattern of pomegranate and foliage sprays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap, 1700–50.
1700–50. Medium: cotton, linen, silk, metallic
Technique: embroidery. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1951-105-32.
